snippet.title: Moonstone Island Announcement Trailer
snippet.description: Moonstone Island is an open-world deckbuilding game with creatures to collect, items to craft, dungeons to explore, and secrets to discover. I asked the dev about how combat works compared to something like Pokémon: "You don’t knock spirits out but instead banish them to the 'great beyond' which is the spirit realm in our world. You don’t 'catch' them, but instead 'tame' them with the crops you grow." https://store.steampowered.com/app/1658150/Moonstone_Island/ #indiegames #gaming #switch
